categories.name: UTF-16 to UTF-32 (Well-Formed)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-16 data to UTF-32 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-16 to UTF-8 (Well-Formed)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-16 data to UTF-8 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-8 to UTF-16 (Well-Formed)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-8 data to UTF-16 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-8 to UTF-32 (Well-Formed)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-8 data to UTF-32 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-32 to UTF-8 (Well-Formed)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-32 data to UTF-8 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-32 to UTF-16 (Well-Formed)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-32 data to UTF-16 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-16 to UTF-32 (Well-Formed, with Init)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-16 data to UTF-32 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-16 to UTF-8 (Well-Formed, with Init)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-16 data to UTF-8 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-8 to UTF-16 (Well-Formed, with Init)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-8 data to UTF-16 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-8 to UTF-32 (Well-Formed, with Init)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-8 data to UTF-32 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-32 to UTF-8 (Well-Formed, with Init)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-32 data to UTF-8 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

categories.name: UTF-32 to UTF-16 (Well-Formed, with Init)
categories.description: A conversion from UTF-32 data to UTF-16 data that contains no ill-formed or incomplete sequences.

data_groups.name: boost.text (unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the boost.text library from Zach Laine and its encoding routines, particularly the all-at-once bulk routines.

data_groups.name: boost.text view
data_groups.description: Measures the boost.text library from Zach laine and its encoding routines, partocularly the one-at-a-time views that can be fed into C and C++ algorithms using the view's iterator abstraction.

data_groups.name: cuneicode registry (unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the non-typed conversion routines from its Conversion Registry abstraction with specific conversion pathways overridden (without providing an output size).

data_groups.name: cuneicode registry
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the non-typed conversion routines from its Conversion Registry abstraction with all defaults left alone.

data_groups.name: cuneicode registry (unbounded, assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the non-typed conversion routines from its Conversion Registry abstraction with specific conversion pathways overridden (without providing an output size, and without checking input validity).

data_groups.name: cuneicode registry (assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the non-typed conversion routines from its Conversion Registry abstraction with all defaults left alone (without checking for the validity of the input).

data_groups.name: cuneicode
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the typed, non-generic C-style encoding routines.

data_groups.name: cuneicode (unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the typed, non-generic C-style encoding routines (without providing an output size).

data_groups.name: cuneicode (single loop)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the typed, non-generic C-style encoding routines that use the "indivisable unit fo conversion" functions.

data_groups.name: cuneicode (single loop, unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.cuneicode library from Shepherd's Oasis and its encoding routines, particularly the typed, non-generic C-style encoding routines "indivisable unit fo conversion" functions (without providing an output size).

data_groups.name: libiconv
data_groups.description: Measures the libiconv (GNU version) encoding library, using its POSIX-compliant function call "iconv".

data_groups.name: simdutf (unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the performance of Daniel Lemire's simdutf library, which is meant to be highly optimized and performant under all unicode workloads.

data_groups.name: simdutf (unbounded, assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the performance of Daniel Lemire's simdutf library, which is meant to be highly optimized and performant under all unicode workloads.

data_groups.name: Rust's encoding_c
data_groups.description: Measures the performance of the Rust encoding_rs library, called through its C bindings encoding_c (typically statically linked in to achieve the same optimization potential). Used in the Gecko web engine.

data_groups.name: Rust's encoding_c (manual)
data_groups.description: Measures the performance of the Rust encoding_rs library, called through its C bindings encoding_c and not using the general-purpose conversion routes (typically statically linked in to achieve the same optimization potential). Used in the Gecko web engine.

data_groups.name: ctre (assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the performance of the Compile-Time Regular Expression (CTRE) library's internal encoding conversion routines, which assume the input is valid (or produce invalid code points when it is not).

data_groups.name: utf8cpp (unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the utf8cpp library and its conversion routines, which do not check for available output space.

data_groups.name: utf8cpp (unbounded, assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the utf8cpp library and its conversion routines, which do not check for available output space and also assume the input is valid.

data_groups.name: ICU (2 UConverter convertEx)
data_groups.description: Measures the ICU library and its conversion routines when routed through 2 generic "UConverter" converter objects.

data_groups.name: ICU (u_strFromUTF8)
data_groups.description: Measures the ICU library conversion routine using the specific u_strFromUTF8 function.

data_groups.name: ICU (ucnv_toUChars)
data_groups.description: Measures the ICU library conversion routine using the specific ucnv_toUChars function.

data_groups.name: ICU (u_strToUTF8)
data_groups.description: Measures the ICU library conversion routine using the specific u_strToUTF8 function.

data_groups.name: ICU (UnicodeString_toUTF8)
data_groups.description: Measures the ICU library conversion routine using the specific UnicodeString_toUTF8 function.

data_groups.name: ICU (ucnv_fromUChars)
data_groups.description: Measures the ICU library conversion routine using the specific ucnv_fromUChars function.

data_groups.name: ICU (u_strFromUTF32)
data_groups.description: Measures the ICU library conversion routine using the specific u_strFromUTF32 function.

data_groups.name: ztd.text
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode function.

data_groups.name: ztd.text (unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode function, with output bounds checking turned off.

data_groups.name: ztd.text (single loop)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode_one function.

data_groups.name: ztd.text (single loop, unbounded)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode_one function in a loop, with output bounds checking turned off.

data_groups.name: ztd.text view
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode_view range abstraction.

data_groups.name: ztd.text (assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode function.

data_groups.name: ztd.text (unbounded, assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode function, with output bounds checking turned off.

data_groups.name: ztd.text (single loop, assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode_one function.

data_groups.name: ztd.text (single loop, unbounded, assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode_one function in a loop, with output bounds checking turned off.

data_groups.name: ztd.text view (assume valid)
data_groups.description: Measures the ztd.text library conversion routine using the ztd::text::transcode_view range abstraction.

data_groups.name: Win32
data_groups.description: Measures the Win32 API conversion routine using MultibyteToWideChar function or the WideCharToMultibyte function.

data_groups.name: Standard C
data_groups.description: Measures the <uchar.h>, <wchar.h>, and similar functionality present in the C standard library.

data_groups.name: Standard C++
data_groups.description: Measures the deprecated std::codecvt_* functionality present in the C++ standard library.

data_groups.name: noop
data_groups.description: Measures doing literally nothing (no written expressions/statements in the benchmarking loop). Can be useful for determining potential environment noise.

data_labels.name: real time
data_labels.description: The amount of elapsed time in the real world; also known as "wall clock" time.

data_labels.name: cpu time
data_labels.description: The amount of elapsed time if work done was laid out in linear time and did not have concurrency, parallelization, or multithreading in use.
